instructions: Put the dinner fork towards the left side with its head pointing upwards.
Put the dinner knife to the right of the dinner fork with its head pointing upwards.
Add a salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with its head pointing upwards.
Add a salad knife to the right of the dinner knife.
Put the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with its head pointing upwards.
Put the dessert spoon horizontally across the top, above the forts and spoons with its head left.
Put the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon with its head upwards.
Add the dessert spoon above the fork and dinner fork horizontally with its head pointing left.
Add the dinner plate to the center between the for forks and knives.
Add the bread plate to the left side above the forks and to the left of the spoon.
Add the butter knife diagonally across the bread plate with its head pointing down to the left.
Put the wine glass on the right side above the soup spoon.
Add the water glass to the left of the wine glass and to the right of the horizontal spoon.
Put the napkin in the center of the dinner plate vertically.
